name: The Murder at Montague Manor
description:
You've been invited to a murder mystery party. What could possibly go wrong?

This game was made in 31 days for the Toadhouse Visual Novel Game Jam 2021.

CONTENT WARNINGS: cartoon violence, some mature language

Coding:
Reed McCallum
Ryan Smith

Art and animations:
Ryan Smith

Writing:
Emma Powers

Sound and music:
Idean Behforouz

Title card:
Lila Boehnke
